statements: DELETE FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE location = 'Maldives' AND price > 500 AND available_units < 5;
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE price < 200 AND available_rooms > 0;
DELETE FROM Villas WHERE id = 100 AND bedrooms > 3;
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE rating < 4.5 AND available_rooms < total_rooms/2 ;
DELETE FROM Villas WHERE location = 'Maldives' AND capacity > 5;
DELETE FROM Resorts WHERE rating < 3.5 OR price > 5000;
DELETE FROM private_islands WHERE location = 'Tropical Paradise' AND price > 500000.00;
DELETE FROM amenities WHERE amenity_name = 'Private Beach';
